issue.title: [C++][Python] Support slicing to arbitrary end in list_slice kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18280](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18280). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[GitHub PR \| https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14395] adds support for `list_slice` kernel, but does not implement what to do when `stop == std::nullopt`, which should slice to the end of the list elements.
